full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GZUNGS SNGAGS DANG, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I MTSAN, BKA' 'GYUR SNYING PO'I KHA 'DON BYED RGYU ZAB MO'I RIGS PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
